FontData.summary: NOTE Experimental The FontData interface of the {{domxref("Local Font Access API", "Local Font Access API", "", "nocode")}} represents a single local font face.

FontDataFullName.summary: NOTE Experimental The fullName read-only property of the interface returns the full name of the font face. This is usually a human-readable name used to identify the font, e.g., "Optima Bold".

FontDataFamily.summary: NOTE Experimental The family read-only property of the interface returns the family of the font face.

remarks.para: This is the name used when referring to the font family from code, for example, in the font-family property or in places within the @font-face at-rule such as the local() function.

FontDataStyle.summary: NOTE Experimental The style read-only property of the interface returns the style of the font face.

remarks.para: This is the value used to select the style of the font you want to use, for example inside the font-style property.

FontDataBlob.summary: NOTE Experimental The blob() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with a containing the raw bytes of the underlying font file.
FontDataBlob.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with a containing the raw bytes of the underlying font file.

FontDataPostscriptName.summary: NOTE Experimental The postscriptName read-only property of the interface returns the PostScript name of the font face.

remarks.para: This is the name used to uniquely identify the PostScript font, and is generally an unbroken sequence of characters that includes the font's name and style.
